response.overview: Gautham is guy who lost his job because of being triggered by his workplace, now he thinks there is no future for him to love, so he decided to leave things that he love the most. And that's where Teja came to solve his problem and made his mind clear and stable
response.tagline: Enmeedhu Anbu Kolla | Malaysian Tami Short Film | Saravanan | Sornamalar | Zinephile Pictures
response.title: En meedhu Anbu Kolla
